程序包 webServiceAPI

类 ServicesAdapter

java.lang.Object
webServiceAPI.ServicesAdapter
所有已实现的接口:
WebServicesTarget
public class ServicesAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements WebServicesTarget
This class will adapter Web Services API to our application.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode[] getAllData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String query)
    fetch all data according to url return ObjectNode array containing all data.
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getSpecificData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String query)
    fetch a particular resource by ID(based on different parameter/path) return ObjectNode jsonNode that contains data
    java.lang.String getToken​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
    override the parents' method Authenticating a user's credentials using the POST /user/login endpoint
    boolean patchData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString, java.lang.String id)
    patch the specific data according to specific id and specific data in the correct path
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode postData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString)
    like database basic function post the data to web service and update the database
    boolean putData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString, java.lang.String id)
    do same things with put or patch web request
    boolean verifyToken​(java.lang.String token)
    Verify the token

    • getAllData

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode[] getAllData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String query) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      fetch all data according to url return ObjectNode array containing all data.
      指定者:
      getAllData 在接口中 WebServicesTarget
      参数:
      path - the path of the operation to be performed (e.g. /users/login), see enums.Path or documentation for more details
      query - the query of the operation to be performed (e.g. ?id=1), see enums.Query or documentation for more details
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • getSpecificData

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getSpecificData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String query) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      fetch a particular resource by ID(based on different parameter/path) return ObjectNode jsonNode that contains data
      指定者:
      getSpecificData 在接口中 WebServicesTarget
      参数:
      path - the path of the operation to be performed (e.g. /users/login), see enums.Path or documentation for more details
      id - the id of the data
      query - the query of the operation to be performed (e.g. ?id=1), see enums.Query or documentation for more details
      返回:
      objectNode contains the specific data
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • getToken

      public java.lang.String getToken​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      override the parents' method Authenticating a user's credentials using the POST /user/login endpoint
      指定者:
      getToken 在接口中 WebServicesTarget
      参数:
      userName - the userName the user login
      password - the password the user login
      返回:
      the string contains token
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • postData

      public com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode postData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      从接口复制的说明: WebServicesTarget
      like database basic function post the data to web service and update the database
      指定者:
      postData 在接口中 WebServicesTarget
      参数:
      path - URL path
      jsonString - a correct json string that can be parsed by Jackson and you want to add to the server

      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

      public boolean putData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString, java.lang.String id) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      从接口复制的说明: WebServicesTarget
      do same things with put or patch web request
      指定者:
      putData 在接口中 WebServicesTarget
      参数:
      path - sub URL path
      jsonString - schema of the data
      id - the id of the data
      返回:
      boolean value: true-success, false-failure
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException

    • patchData

      public boolean patchData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString, java.lang.String id) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      从接口复制的说明: WebServicesTarget
      patch the specific data according to specific id and specific data in the correct path
      指定者:
      patchData 在接口中 WebServicesTarget
      参数:
      path - URL path
      jsonString - schema of the specific data (e.g. "{\"isReceptionist\": true}")
      id - the id of the object/entity
      返回:
      boolean value: true-success, false-failure
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException
